title: Trump follows through on tariff threats against Canada, Mexico & China
shortDescription: The new tariffs on imports from all three nations ‒ which are on top of existing tariffs ‒ went into effect Saturday.

title: Trump orders military airstrikes that kill ISIS militants in Somalia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced Saturday that he ordered military strikes that killed several ISIS militants in Somalia.

title: President Trump on Mount Rushmore? Congresswoman introduces bill
shortDescription: Florida Congresswoman Anna Paulina Luna introduced a bill to carve President Donald Trump into Mount Rushmore alongside four other presidents.

title: Trump's public statements on D.C. crash could end up in lawsuits
shortDescription: Families of the victims in Wednesday’s catastrophic airline collision could receive a boost in lawsuits from high-profile comments accepting blame.

title: Trump says he halted $50 million in condoms for Gaza. Is it true?
shortDescription: The U.S. has spent millions of dollars to send contraceptives to other countries. Did Trump's White House really stop $50 million in condoms for Gaza?

title: He led the Jan. 6 committee. He worries more violence may be ahead.
shortDescription: Congressman worries that Trump's pardon of 1,500 people who attacked the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021 creates risk for more bloodshed

title: Trump's envoy leaves Venezuela with 6 Americans after meeting Maduro
shortDescription: One of US envoy Richard Grenell's top aims for the visit with Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro securing the release of detained Americans.

title: Trump tackles government regulation in dramatic new executive order
shortDescription: The president's latest order requires federal agencies repeal "at least 10 existing rules" for every new rule created.

title: Trump's DOJ launches purge of Jan. 6 prosecutors, FBI agents
shortDescription: A group representing FBI agents issued a rare public warning of the potential for hundreds of firings at the nation's top law enforcement agency.

title: Federal government websites go dark, following White House directive
shortDescription: Federal agencies are reshaping their messaging to reflect President Donald Trump's priorities.

title: Rubio to visit Panama in shadow of Trump’s canal threats
shortDescription: Secretary of State Marco Rubio's first stop this weekend will be Panama City as Trump' administration shifts back Washington's focus to Latin America.

title: US judge blocks Trump from freezing federal spending for 22 states
shortDescription: The temporary restraining order will be in place until further order of the court while the judge considers whether to issue a longer injunction.

title: What we know about Trump implementing Project 2025
shortDescription: President Donald Trump tried to distance himself from Project 2025 on the campaign trail, but is he implementing its policies? Here's what we know.

title: No, this Trump post about 'Hollywood liberals' isn't real | Fact check
shortDescription: The image is a fabrication. There is no record of the post on Trump's Truth Social profile.

title: Bishop who spoke at Trump prayer service not removed | Fact check
shortDescription: Bishop Mariann Budde is listed as bishop on the Washington National Cathedral website, and the Episcopal Church has issued a statement supporting her.

title: This hurricane survivor was helped under Biden, not Trump | Fact check
shortDescription: The video was captured on Jan. 9, according to FEMA. President Donald Trump was sworn into office more than a week later on Jan. 20.

title: Former Transportation Sec. Buttigieg responds to Trump blaming DEI for plane crash
shortDescription: Former Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg pushed back against President Donald Trump’s criticism of the Biden administration's diversity initiatives.

title: Trump to hit Canada, Mexico and China with tariffs on Saturday
shortDescription: Trump will impose 25% tariffs on imports from Canada and Mexico and 10% on goods from China, following a pledge he made after winning the White House.

title: CA Democrats want oil companies to pay for disasters
shortDescription: California lawmakers proposed a bill that could allow victims of the southern California wildfires and other disasters to sue oil and gas companies.

title: Trump threatens Canada and Mexico with tariffs
shortDescription: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said "we won't relent until tariffs are removed," after President Trump threatened Canada and Mexico with tariffs.

title: No, two Jan. 6 rioters weren't killed after Trump pardons | Fact check
shortDescription: While a man pardoned by Trump was fatally shot by a deputy during a Jan. 26 traffic stop, the second death mentioned in the posts happened in 2024.

title: Nvidia CEO meets with Trump as he weighs new chip restrictions
shortDescription: Startup DeekSeek is highlighting advances in China's AI industry. The Trump administration is weighing new restrictions on sending AI chips to China.
